00085 #include <stdio.h>
00086 #include <string.h>
00087 #include "log_functions.h"

00090 static family_error_t tab_test_err[] =
00091 {
00092 #define ERR_PIPO_1  0
00093   {ERR_PIPO_1, "ERR_PIPO_1", "Premiere Error Pipo"},
00094 #define ERR_PIPO_2  1 
00095   {ERR_PIPO_2, "ERR_PIPO_2", "Deuxieme Error Pipo"},
00096 
00097   {ERR_NULL, "ERR_NULL", ""}
00098 };
00099 
00100 
00104 void * Test1(void * arg){
00105     
00106   char tampon[255] ;
00107   log_t jd = LOG_INITIALIZER ;
00108   desc_log_stream_t  voie ;
00109   
00110   SetNameFunction((char *)arg);
00111   
00112   /* Init d'un journal */
00113   strcpy( voie.path  , "/dev/tty" ) ;
00114   AddLogStreamJd( &jd, V_FILE, voie, LOG_MAJOR, INF ) ;
00115  
00116   voie.fd = fileno( stderr ) ;
00117   AddLogStreamJd( &jd, V_FD, voie, LOG_CRITICAL, INF ) ;
00118 
00119   voie.flux = stderr ;
00120   AddLogStreamJd( &jd, V_STREAM, voie, LOG_EVENT, INF ) ;
00121 
00122   DisplayLogFlux( stdout, "%s", "Essai numero 1" ) ;
00123   DisplayLogFlux( stdout, "%s", "Essai numero 2" ) ;
00124   DisplayLogFlux( stdout, "Troncature impossible sur %s | %s", "un", "deux" ) ;
00125   DisplayLog( "%s", "Essai journal numero 1" ) ;
00126   DisplayLog( "%s", "Essai Log numero 2" ) ;  
00127   DisplayLogFd( fileno( stderr ), "%s", "Essai fd numero 1" ) ;
00128   DisplayLogFd( fileno( stderr ), "%s", "Essai fd numero 2" ) ;  
00129   DisplayLogPath( "/dev/tty", "Essai sur un path numero 1" ) ;
00130   DisplayLogPath( "/dev/tty", "Essai sur un path numero 2" ) ;
00131   DisplayLogString( tampon, "%s --> %d", "essai", 10 ) ;
00132   printf( "%s", tampon ) ; 
00133 
00134   DisplayLogJdLevel( jd, LOG_MAJOR, "Essai sur un jd: MAJOR" ) ;
00135   DisplayLogJdLevel( jd, LOG_CRITICAL, "Essai sur un jd: CRIT" ) ;
00136 
00137   printf( "------------------------------------------------------\n" ) ;
00138   
00139   DisplayErrorFlux( stdout, 0, ERR_FORK, 2 ) ;
00140   DisplayErrorFd( fileno( stdout ), 0, ERR_MALLOC, 3 ) ;
00141   DisplayErrorLog( 0, ERR_SOCKET, 4 ) ;
00142   DisplayErrorJd( jd, ERR_SYS, ERR_POPEN, 3 ) ;
00143   DisplayErrorStringLine( tampon, 0, ERR_SIGACTION, 1, 12345 ) ;
00144   printf( "-->%s\n", tampon ) ;
00145 
00146   printf( "------------------------------------------------------\n" ) ;
00147   
00148   DisplayErrorFlux( stdout, 3, ERR_PIPO_2, 2 ) ;
00149   puts( "Une erreur numerique : erreur %d = %R" ) ;
00150   log_sprintf( tampon, "Une erreur numerique : erreur %d = %J%R, dans err_pipo_1 %J%r", 5, 0, 5, 3, ERR_PIPO_2 ) ;
00151   puts( tampon ) ;
00152   DisplayLogFlux( stdout, "Une erreur numerique : erreur %d = %J%R, dans err_pipo_1 %J%r", 5,0, 5, 3, ERR_PIPO_2 ) ;
00153   DisplayErrorFlux( stderr, 3, ERR_PIPO_1, 1 ) ;
00154   
00155   
00156   /* teste si le nom du thread est reste le meme depuis le debut : */
00157   if (strcmp(ReturnNameFunction(),(char*)arg)){
00158     
00159     printf("***** ERROR: initial function name \"%s\" differs from \"%s\" *****\n",
00160         (char*)arg,ReturnNameHost());
00161     return (void *)1;
00162     
00163   }
00164     
00165   printf( "Test reussi: Les tests sont passes avec succes\n" ) ;
00166   
00167   return (void *)0;
00168    
00169 }
00170   
00171  
00172 static char usage[] = "usage:\n\ttest_liblog STD|MT";
00173  
00174 #define NB_THREADS 20
00175 
00176 int main( int argc, char * argv[] )
00177 {  
00178     
00179   if (argc==2){
00180             
00181     
00182     /* TEST 1 Standard */
00183     
00184     if (!strcmp(argv[1],"STD")){
00185       
00186       int rc;
00187       
00188       SetNamePgm( "test_liblog" ) ;
00189       SetNameHost( "localhost" );
00190       SetNameFileLog( "/dev/tty" ) ;
00191       InitDebug( NIV_EVENT ) ;
00192       printf( "AddFamilyError = %d\n", AddFamilyError( 3, "Family Pipo", tab_test_err ) ) ;
00193       printf( "La famille qui a ete ajoutee est %s\n", ReturnNameFamilyError( 3 ) ) ;
00194 
00195       
00196       rc = (int)Test1((void*)"monothread");
00197       return rc;
00198       
00199     }
00200     
00201     
00202     /* TEST 1 multithread */    
00203     
00204     else if (!strcmp(argv[1],"MT")){
00205     
00206       /* multithread test */
00207       pthread_attr_t th_attr[NB_THREADS];
00208       pthread_t threads[NB_THREADS];
00209       int th_index,i;
00210       void * result;
00211             
00212       SetNamePgm( "test_liblog" ) ;
00213       SetNameHost( "localhost" );
00214       SetNameFileLog( "/dev/tty" ) ;
00215       InitDebug( NIV_EVENT ) ;
00216       printf( "AddFamilyError = %d\n", AddFamilyError( 3, "Family Pipo", tab_test_err ) ) ;
00217       printf( "La famille qui a ete ajoutee est %s\n", ReturnNameFamilyError( 3 ) ) ;
00218 
00219       
00220       /* creation of attributes */
00221       for (th_index=0;th_index<NB_THREADS;th_index++){
00222         pthread_attr_init(&th_attr[th_index]);
00223         pthread_attr_setdetachstate(&th_attr[th_index],PTHREAD_CREATE_JOINABLE);
00224       }
00225       
00226       /* creation of threads with their names */
00227       for (i=0;i<NB_THREADS;i++){
00228         int rc;
00229         char * thread_name = malloc(256);
00230         snprintf(thread_name,256,"thread %d",i);
00231         rc = pthread_create(&(threads[i]),&th_attr[i],Test1,(void*)thread_name);
00232       }
00233       
00234       /* waiting for threads termination */
00235       for (i=0;i<NB_THREADS;i++){
00236         pthread_join(threads[i],&result);
00237         if (result) return 1;
00238       }
00239       
00240       return 0;
00241       
00242     }
00243     
00244     /* unknown test */
00245     else {
00246       printf("%s\n",usage);
00247       exit(1);      
00248     }
00249       
00250   } else {   
00251     printf("%s\n",usage);
00252     exit(1);      
00253   }
00254   
00255 }
